quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Art is never finished, only abandoned.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: A painter should begin every canvas with a wash of black, because all things in nature are dark except where exposed by the light.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: A well-spent day brings happy sleep.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Water is the driving force of all nature.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Poor is the pupil who does not surpass his master.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Iron rusts from disuse; water loses its purity from stagnationâ€¦ even so does inaction sap the vigor of the mind.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I love those who can smile in trouble.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: He who wishes to be rich in a day will be hanged in a year.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Time abides long enough for those who make use of it.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Experience does not err. Only your judgments err by expecting from her what is not in her power.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The knowledge of all things is possible.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Just as a well-filled day brings blessed sleep, so a well-employed life brings a blessed death.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Details make perfection, and perfection is not a detail.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: He who loves practice without theory is like the sailor who boards ship without a rudder and compass and never knows where he may cast.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: While I thought that I was learning how to live, I have been learning how to die.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Life well spent is long.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Wisdom is the daughter of experience.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: In time and with water, everything changes.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Every action needs to be prompted by a motive.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: He who thinks little errs much.
author: Leonardo da Vinci
